trans-unit.source: Recognizes ink gestures.
trans-unit.target: Reconnaît des mouvements d'entrée manuscrite.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> identifies an ink gesture.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> identifie un mouvement d’entrée manuscrite.

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> to recognize all or a subset of application gestures.
trans-unit.target: Vous pouvez définir le <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> à reconnaître la totalité ou un sous-ensemble de mouvements d’application.

trans-unit.source: To set the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> to recognize a subset of the available gestures, pass an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> array to the constructor or use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.SetEnabledGestures%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Pour définir le <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> afin qu’il reconnaisse un sous-ensemble des mouvements disponibles, passez un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> tableau au constructeur ou utilisez le <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.SetEnabledGestures%2A> (méthode).

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> contains a gesture, call the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Pour déterminer si un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> contient un mouvement, appelez le <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> (méthode).

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: Utilisation de texte XAML

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Vous ne pouvez pas utiliser cette classe dans [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.ScratchOut> gesture.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant montre comment déterminer si un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> est un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.ScratchOut> mouvement.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" />.

trans-unit.source: When it is created with this constructor, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> recognizes all application gestures.
trans-unit.target: Lorsqu’elle est créée avec ce constructeur, le <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> reconnaît tous les mouvements de l’application.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture" /> that specifies the application gestures the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> will recognize.
trans-unit.target: Un tableau de type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture" /> qui spécifie les mouvements d'application que <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> reconnaîtra.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> that recognizes a subset of the application gestures.
trans-unit.target: Utilisez le <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.%23ctor%2A> constructeur pour créer un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> qui reconnaît un sous-ensemble des mouvements d’application.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> that recognizes only the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Down>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Right>, and <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.ScratchOut> gestures.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant montre comment créer un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> qui reconnaît uniquement le <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Down>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Right>, et <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.ScratchOut> mouvements.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" />.
trans-unit.target: Libère toutes les ressources utilisées par <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" />.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Dispose%2A> when you finish using the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.
trans-unit.target: Appelez <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Dispose%2A> lorsque vous avez terminé à l’aide de la <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: La méthode <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Dispose%2A> rend le <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> inutilisable.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, after calling <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Par conséquent, après avoir appelé <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Dispose%2A>, vous devez libérer toutes les références à la <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> pour que le garbage collector puisse récupérer la mémoire qui le <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> occupée.

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.
trans-unit.target: Appelez toujours <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Dispose%2A> avant de libérer votre dernière référence à <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Sinon, les ressources utilisées ne seront pas libérées tant que le garbage collector n'aura pas appelé la méthode <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> de l'objet `Finalize`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the gestures that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> recognizes.
trans-unit.target: Obtient les mouvements que le <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> reconnaît.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture" /> that contains gestures the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> is set to recognize.
trans-unit.target: Un tableau de type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture" /> qui contient des gestes que le <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> est configuré pour reconnaître.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to get the application gestures that a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> recognizes.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant montre comment obtenir l’application mouvements qu’un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> reconnaît.

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean that indicates whether the gesture recognizer is available on the user's system.
trans-unit.target: Obtient une valeur booléenne qui indique si le module de reconnaissance de mouvement est disponible sur le système de l'utilisateur.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the recognition component is available; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si le composant de reconnaissance est disponible ; sinon, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to determine whether the gesture recognizer is available before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant montre comment déterminer si le module de reconnaissance de mouvement est disponible avant d’appeler le <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> (méthode).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> to search for gestures.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> pour rechercher les mouvements.

trans-unit.source: Looks for gestures in the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Recherche des gestes dans la <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> spécifiée.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult" /> that contains application gestures that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> recognized.
trans-unit.target: Un tableau de type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult" /> qui contient les mouvements d'application reconnus par <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" />.

trans-unit.source: The array returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> method is sorted by the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Le tableau retourné par la <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> méthode est triée par le <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriété.

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> may return a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> array with the following values:
trans-unit.target: Par exemple, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> peut retourner un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> tableau avec les valeurs suivantes :

trans-unit.source: Index
trans-unit.target: Index

trans-unit.source: ApplicationGesture
trans-unit.target: ApplicationGesture

trans-unit.source: RecognitionConfidence
trans-unit.target: RecognitionConfidence

trans-unit.source: This means that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> recognizes that it is very likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a check mark, relatively likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> in not a gesture, and not at all likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a curlicue or a double curlicue.
trans-unit.target: Cela signifie que la <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> reconnaît qu’il est très probable qui le <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> est activé, relativement probable qui le <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> pas un mouvement et peu probable qui le <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> soit une fioriture ou une fioriture double.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> method can return an array with <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.NoGesture> at a higher <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> than other application gestures.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> méthode peut retourner un tableau avec <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.NoGesture> avec un degré plus élevé <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> à d’autres mouvements d’application.

trans-unit.source: This means that it is more likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is not a gesture, as opposed to a gesture that has a lower <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>.
trans-unit.target: Cela signifie qu’il est plus probable que la <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> n’est pas un mouvement, par opposition à un mouvement qui a un faible <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.ScratchOut> gesture.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant montre comment déterminer si un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> est un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.ScratchOut> mouvement.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture" /> that specifies the application gestures you wish the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> to recognize.
trans-unit.target: Un tableau de type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture" /> qui spécifie les mouvements d'application que vous souhaitez que <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> reconnaisse.

trans-unit.source: Sets the application gestures that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> recognizes.
trans-unit.target: Définit les mouvements d'application que le <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> reconnaît.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> that recognizes only the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Down>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Right>, and <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.ScratchOut> gestures.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant montre comment créer un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> qui reconnaît uniquement le <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Down>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Right>, et <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.ScratchOut> mouvements.
